text:
I can't believe people still spend hours on brainstorming when there is ChatGPT-o3 + search. 

(And no. I'm not talking about basic brainstorming) 

How to best use AI for brainstorming, a guide:

✅ Write a prompt
✅ Get a burst of ideas from ChatGPT
✅ Follow up and keep iterating until you nailed it

Now you must "call" a brainstorming technique within ChatGPT as a framework to follow.

✅ Mind Mapping: Visualize branching clusters of ideas.
✅ Brainwriting 6-3-5: Stack rapid-fire ideas in silent rounds.
✅ Lotus Blossom: Expand core themes into layered petals.
✅ Random Word Association: Trigger fresh angles with unexpected stimuli.
✅ Morphological Matrix: Mix and match attributes to spark novel concepts.
